  • To move to the next stage: Prospect must be qualified

Note: stage is for deals not ‘actively’ managed --> not pursuing a contract signature in the near future

  • Prospect buying journey: shown interest in Planet or its competition

• Currently in this stage: Value proposition presented, further tailoring of solution to business needs
